Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to disclosure of motion picture start times
Summary: Requires ticket operators to conspicuously display the scheduled start time of the motion picture on tickets.
LawCode: Add ยง61.15, Arts & Cul L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the arts and cultural affairs law, in relation to disclosure of motion picture start times
